objection_handlers.objection: Your prices are way higher than [grocery store/big box]
objection_handlers.underlying_concern: Feeling taken advantage of or making poor financial decision
objection_handlers.authentic_response: You're absolutely right - we charge more per item. What you're paying for is saving 30 minutes of your time, gas money, and the hassle of parking and navigating a huge store. When you need [milk] at 9pm or forgot something for tonight's dinner, that convenience is worth a few extra dollars to most folks. We're here when you need us.
objection_handlers.reframe: Position as time-savings and stress-reduction investment, not just product price

objection_handlers.objection: I can just wait and get it at my regular grocery trip
objection_handlers.underlying_concern: Justifying the immediate purchase versus delayed gratification
objection_handlers.authentic_response: If it can wait, that's probably smarter! We're really here for when it can't wait - when you're out of coffee for tomorrow morning, when your kid needs something for school, or when you're already on the road. No judgment either way.
objection_handlers.reframe: Acknowledge their logic while reinforcing your role for genuine urgency

objection_handlers.reframe: Build trust through transparency and helpful service

objection_handlers.underlying_concern: Making sure they're choosing the best option available
objection_handlers.authentic_response: If they're closer to you, definitely go there! We know we're not everyone's closest option. But our regulars keep coming back because [we're always stocked/our staff knows them/we're cleaner/we have better coffee]. Give us a try when you're nearby.

objection_handlers.objection: I never know if you're open

objection_handlers.authentic_response: We're open [HOURS] every single day - even holidays. You can always count on us being here. Some folks even save our number in their phone so they can call if they're ever unsure.
objection_handlers.reframe: Emphasize reliability and consistency as core value

objection_handlers.authentic_response: We hear you - that's a real concern at some places. We take cleanliness and safety seriously here. [Clean restrooms/well-lit parking/fresh food daily/visible security]. Come see for yourself, and if we ever fall short, please tell us.

objection_handlers.objection: I'm trying to avoid impulse purchases
